name: Codeforces - Competitive Programming Contests
stem_focus: Computer Science, Algorithms, Data Structures, Mathematics
eligibility: Open to all; create free account
description: Regular competitive programming contests held multiple times per week; rated contests affect global ranking; solve algorithmic problems under time constraints; supports 60+ programming languages including C++, Java, Python.

name: Codeforces - Educational Rounds
description: Educational rounds designed for learning; extended 12-hour practice phase after contest; detailed editorials and tutorials; ideal for beginners and intermediate programmers; rated for Division 2.

name: Codeforces - Problem Archive
eligibility: Open to all; no account required to view
description: 8000+ practice problems organized by difficulty rating (800-3500); filter by tags (dp, graphs, greedy, math, etc.); view solutions and tutorials; track problem-solving statistics; practice at your own pace.

name: Codeforces - Gym (Virtual Contests)
eligibility: Open to all; free account required
description: Virtual contests for practice; compete in past contests at any time; team practice available; includes regional ICPC problems; unrated practice environment; simulate real contest conditions.

name: Codeforces - Global Rating System
description: Global rating system from Newbie to Legendary Grandmaster; Division 1, 2, 3, and 4 contests based on skill level; track progress and compete globally; color-coded rankings; division promotions based on performance; high school students compete at all levels.
